headline: Agilent and National Heart Centre Singapore Sign Agreement to Advance Metabolic Heart Failure Research
summary: Agilent Technologies Inc. (NYSE: A) announced the signing of a five-year Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with National Heart Centre Singapore (NHCS) to accelerate innovation in metabolic heart failure research, one of the most complex and underserved areas in cardiovascular medicine.

content.title: Agilent and National Heart Centre Singapore Sign Agreement to Advance Metabolic Heart Failure Research
content.summary: Agilent Technologies Inc. (NYSE: A) announced the signing of a five-year Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with National Heart Centre Singapore (NHCS) to accelerate innovation in metabolic heart failure research, one of the most complex and underserved areas in cardiovascular medicine.

thumbnail.caption: (from right) Asst. Prof Chrishan Ramachandra, Principal Investigator of National Heart Research Institute Singapore (NHRIS) at National Heart Centre Singapore (NHCS), Prof. Derek Hausenloy, Director of NHRIS at NHCS, Dr Charmian Cher, Associate Vice President of Field Marketing for APAC at Agilent, and Dr Samir Vyas, Associate Vice President of Sales for APAC at Agilent, during the signing ceremony at Biopolis in Singapore.

headline: Agilent’s New Innovation Hub Partnership Could Be a Game Changer for Agilent Technologies (A)
summary: Agilent Technologies has announced the launch of the Agilent Innovation Hub in partnership with the University of Melbourne to enhance environmental and population health research, integrating the company's advanced technologies with academic expertise. This collaboration highlights Agilent's growing presence in Asia and its leadership in the application of cutting-edge tools for environmental safety and unregulated chemical discovery. We'll explore how Agilent's push into environmental...
